topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Install the Database Service without SSL

body.p: The installer requires a filename for the ephemeral ca cert file. When public SSL is not enabled, this file does not exist.
The workaround is to create and pass a placeholder file and then modify the endpoint URLs after installation completes.

ol.li: Before installation, create an empty file on the deployer. This will serve as a placeholder during installation.touch /tmp/empty-file
In the database section, set the value of ephemeral_ca_cert to the empty file you just created.ephemeral_ca_cert: /tmp/empty-file

After installation has completed, manually modify the endpoint URLs.
SSH into the deployer.
List the database endpoints.user@host:~$ openstack endpoint list | grep databaseThe output will look similar to the following.6962276204934327a09501c0e44fca08 region1 database database True internal https://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s a042121327374301b5106bec388e6146 region1 database database True admin https://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s c02dbcc653824bd4baa7ac2bfe1d4fab region1 database database True public https://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s
Change each endpoint URL from https to http. This is the only change you need to make.user@host:~$ openstack endpoint set --url 'http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s' 6962276204934327a09501c0e44fca08 user@host:~$ openstack endpoint set --url 'http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s' a042121327374301b5106bec388e6146 user@host:~$ openstack endpoint set --url 'http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/$(tenant_id)s' c02dbcc653824bd4baa7ac2bfe1d4fab
List the database endpoints again for verification:user@host:~$ openstack endpoint list | grep databaseThe output will look similar to the following. Verify that all URLs now begin with http. If not, change them using the instructions provided above.6962276204934327a09501c0e44fca08 region1 database database True internal http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/s a042121327374301b5106bec388e6146 region1 database database True admin http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/s c02dbcc653824bd4baa7ac2bfe1d4fab region1 database database True public http://10.241.127.69:8779/v1.0/s
